documentContentReferences.name: Screening Procedures Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from the summary of changes for Section 1.3 to Section 8 for details on procedures specific to screening sites in the US.

documentContentReferences.name: COVID-19 Vaccine Risk Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 2.3.1.1 to Section 10.5 for potential risks and mitigation measures due to the COVID-19 vaccine.

documentContentReferences.name: Dose Modification Reference in Risk Table
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Table 3 to Section 6.6 for dose modification or discontinuation as a mitigation strategy for potential risks.

documentContentReferences.name: Investigator's Brochure Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Table 3 to the Investigator's Brochure (IB) for data regarding risks of ALXN1840.

documentContentReferences.name: Adaptive Features Table Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 4.1 to Table 4 for a description of adaptive design features and their limits.

documentContentReferences.name: Dose Modification Criteria Table Reference
documentContentReferences.sectionTitle: ALXN1840 Dose Modifications for Individual Participants
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Table 4 to Table 7 for criteria on when a dose should be decreased or interrupted.

documentContentReferences.name: Exclusion Criteria for Blood Donation
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Table 5 (Lifestyle Considerations) to Section 5.2 regarding the exclusion criterion for blood donation.

documentContentReferences.name: Contraceptive Methods Reference
documentContentReferences.sectionTitle: Contraceptive Guidance and Collection of Pregnancy Information
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Table 5 (Lifestyle Considerations) to Section 10.4 for descriptions of appropriate contraceptive methods.

documentContentReferences.name: Inclusion Criteria for Contraception Start
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Table 5 (Lifestyle Considerations) to Section 5.1 for start times for contraceptive use.

documentContentReferences.name: SoA Reference for Intervention Discontinuation
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 7.1 to the SoA for data to be collected at the time of study intervention discontinuation.

documentContentReferences.name: Dose Modification Criteria for Discontinuation
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 7.1 to Section 6.6 for dose modification criteria related to abnormal liver function.

documentContentReferences.name: Pregnancy Discontinuation Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 7.1 to Section 8.2.6 regarding discontinuation from study intervention due to pregnancy.

documentContentReferences.name: SoA Table Reference for Discontinuation
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 7.1 to the SoA (Table 1) for samples and data to be collected at study intervention discontinuation.

documentContentReferences.name: SoA Reference for Participant Withdrawal
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 7.2 to the SoA for data to be collected at the time of participant discontinuation from the study.

documentContentReferences.name: ECG Schedule Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.2.3 to the SoA for the schedule of 12-lead ECGs.

documentContentReferences.name: QTc Withdrawal Criteria Reference
documentContentReferences.sectionTitle: Discontinuation of Study Intervention and Participant Discontinuation/Withdrawal
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.2.3 to Section 7 for QTc withdrawal criteria.

documentContentReferences.name: Clinical Lab Tests Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.2.4 to Section 10.2 for the list of clinical laboratory tests to be performed.

documentContentReferences.name: AE/SAE Procedures Reference
documentContentReferences.sectionTitle: Adverse Events: Definitions and Procedures for Recording, Evaluating, Follow-up, and Reporting
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.3 to Section 10.3 for procedures on recording, evaluating, and reporting AEs and SAEs.

documentContentReferences.name: Lost to Follow-up Definition
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.3.3 to Section 7.3 for the definition of 'lost to follow-up'.

documentContentReferences.name: Genetic Testing Prohibition Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.3.6 to Section 8.7, confirming that biobanked samples will not be used for genetic testing.

documentContentReferences.name: PK Sample Collection Schedule
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.5 to the SoA (Table 1) for the schedule of whole blood sample collection for PK measurements.

documentContentReferences.name: Molybdenum Measurement Details
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.5 to Section 8.1.1 for details of molybdenum measured in food, drinks, urine, and feces.

documentContentReferences.name: PD Sample Collection Schedule
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.6 to the SoA (Table 1) for the schedule of blood sample collection for PD assessments.

documentContentReferences.name: Biomarker Details Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.8 to Section 8.6 for details on copper and ceruloplasmin-related biomarkers.

commentAnnotations.text: Abbreviations: ALT = alanine aminotransferase; AST = aspartate aminotransferase; IB = Investigator’s Brochure; PK = pharmacokinetics; WD = Wilson disease.
commentAnnotations.sourceSection: Table 3: Potential Risks and Mitigation Strategy

commentAnnotations.text: Abbreviations: CRF = case report form; CRU = clinical research unit; EOS = End of Study; SoA = Schedule of Activities.
Abbreviations: ICF = informed consent form; PD = pharmacodynamic; PK = pharmacokinetic.

Note: total molybdenum and PUF molybdenum concentration-time profiles on Day 28 after the last 15 mg ALXN1840 dose will be extrapolated to Day 29 (0-24 hr) and subtracted from the observed Day 29 concentration-time profiles after the first 30 mg

studyDefinitionDocumentVersions.description: Current protocol version. Clarified study procedures for US sites to facilitate recruitment.
